title: The Ultimate Software CD! for Windows XP 32-Bit (TPB)
description:
The Ultimate Software CD! for Windows XP x86

How to, Simply; 
1. Firstly extract, then Burn 'XPSoftCD.iso' to CD/DVD using an ISO burning software, for example; <a href="
http://www.ntfs.com/iso-burning.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.ntfs.com/iso-burning.htm</a> 
2. Pop CD/DVD into CD/DVD drive and let it autoplay 
3. You will then be presented with a nice GUI, this; <a href="
http://bayimg.com/AaKjdaABg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/AaKjdaABg</a>
4. Click any software you desire, what ever software you click on will install completely unattendedly, this means at no point will you need to press anything! You will then be confirmed when your software has installed successfully. 
---------------------------------------
